item.title: FA ShowTV
item.description: Flight Agent remote application This remote app can be installer on a Google TV (xiaomi TV, etc…) and see the map and cameras on the sim.

item.title: Remote android application
item.description: Flight Agent remote application Application to control remotely the simulator and cockpit around it.

item.description: NASA desktop walppaper changer !! In the modules section of config.

item.description: Web page created ! We are happy to announce that this site is created and try to offering a simple solution to sim enhancement.

item.title: Backups
item.description: FlightAgent can make backups of configuration files from: Microsoft Flight Simulator FSUIPC Prosim P3D Just open this from the machine that Flight Agent is running Backup and will download a zip file.

item.title: Customizable
item.description: FlightAgent is an open platform Can be configured to take an actions when an event is fired.

item.title: Hardware extension
item.description: Introduction These are the possibilities of hardware extension for FlightAgent.

item.title: Moving map
item.description: A web page can be opened to show a map of the plane to easily locate the plane.
